text:
@JRubinBlogger Tomorrow we hit the WH's estimate for total deaths from #COVID19.
We weren't supposed to hit it until August, 4 months (22 weeks from now).
The rate of new cases is barely falling at all, but reopening public spaces would kick the pandemic back into high gear.
#TrumpTheUnready https://t.co/XnvDXD9zM4
